summary: Completed testing of AfroVending Vendor Dashboard rebuild features. All requested features are working correctly: Vendor login, Products page with category/image/stock display, Add New Product form with category selector and fulfillment options, Store Settings page with pre-filled data, and Recently Sold section now shows product images instead of 'No Image'.
critical_code_review_comments: vendor_router properly separated in products.py and mounted in server_modular.py - /api/vendor/products now working
RecentlySold.jsx correctly uses product_image field from API (line 57)
homepage.py recently-sold endpoint returns product_image from product.images[0] (line 69)
ImageUploader component properly integrates with Cloudinary using signature-based uploads
Store Settings page pre-fills form with vendor profile data from /api/vendors/me
Add New Product modal includes all required fields: category selector, fulfillment options (FBV/FBA), image upload
seed_data_creation: No new seed data needed - existing test data used
context_for_next_testing_agent: All vendor dashboard features tested and working: 1) Vendor login redirects to /dashboard, 2) /vendor/products shows 15 products with images, categories (Fashion, Health & Wellness, etc), stock counts, FBV badges, 3) Add New Product modal has all fields including category selector and fulfillment option dropdown, 4) /vendor/store-settings loads pre-filled with vendor profile (store name, email, description), 5) Homepage Recently Sold section shows product images from product.images[0], not 'No Image' placeholders, 6) Cloudinary integration working for image uploads (signature-based).

vendor_login.details: Vendor can login with vendor@afrovending.com / AfroVendor2024! and is redirected to /dashboard

vendor_products_api.details: GET /api/vendor/products returns vendor's products with images, categories, stock

vendor_products_page.details: Products page shows 15 products with images, category badges, stock counts, Edit/Delete buttons

add_new_product_form.details: Modal has Product Name, Description, Category selector, Price, Stock, Image upload, Tags, Weight, Dimensions, Fulfillment Option

vendors_me_get.details: GET /api/vendors/me returns vendor profile with store_name, description, country, etc.

vendors_me_update.details: PUT /api/vendors/me successfully updates vendor profile fields

store_settings_page.details: Store Settings page loads pre-filled form with vendor data, has branding section for logo/banner upload

recently_sold_images.details: Recently Sold section shows product images (5 products with images), uses product_image field from API

cloudinary_integration.details: ImageUploader component uses Cloudinary signature endpoint, shows 'Cloud Storage' label

product_categories.details: Categories API returns 14 product categories, Add Product modal shows category selector

fulfillment_options.details: Add Product form has Fulfillment Option dropdown with FBV (Fulfilled by Vendor) and FBA options

product_crud.details: Can create product with all fields including category_id and fulfillment_option
